PARAGRAPH.STRING: , MBE, PC, (June 16, 1912 - February 8, 1998) was a right-wing British politician and Conservative Party Member of Parliament (MP) between 1950 and February 1974, and an Ulster Unionist MP between October 1974 and 1987. Controversial throughout
tenure in senior office was brief.
held controversial views on issues such as race, national identity, immigration, and the United Kingdom's entry into the European Union.
